dashboard.label: Saved Filters
dashboard.description: Displays saved filters configured in Microsoft Defender EASM. Enables visibility into reusable query logic across asset discovery, reports, and investigations.

search.query: index=security_defender_easm sourcetype=defender:easm:saved_filter | stats latest(displayName) as display_name latest(description) as description latest(filterType) as filter_type latest(createdBy) as created_by latest(createdDateTime) as created_date latest(lastModifiedDateTime) as last_modified_date by filterId | rename filterId as filter_id | sort display_name
index=security_defender_easm sourcetype=defender:easm:saved_filter | stats count by filterType
